ygData.subject: Re: Kitting and magic
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hmmm , I know  I hate kiteing too..  why do you think , i think every woodelf druid i meet is a powergamer, But a mage can also kite once they get Jboots
ygData.messageBody:
Mark T Gutierrez wrote:

> From: Mark T Gutierrez <byakhee@...>
>
> Kiting is the art of hitting a monster with DOT's, then running away from
> him and letting your spells kill him. Hopefully you are using SOW or an
> item to increase your speed so the monster can't catch you.
>
> Macabre, Gnome Necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> With more than 20 million e-mails exchanged daily...
> http://www.onelist.com
> ...ONElist is home to the liveliest discussions on the Internet!
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> http://www.tip.it/wizard

hmmm , I know I hate kiteing too.. why do you think , i think every woodelf
druid i meet is a powergamer, But a mage can also kite once they get Jboots
.. cuse as Soon as the mob turns to get on the pet you nuke ...comes after
you pets chasing it whacking and casting away .. Almost all casters can kite
..if They had the speed .. They should Fix this but I don't see how
..


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
